name: World in Faded Colors
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: You may choose 1 of your level 1 or higher characters, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower 《Brigade Leader》 character in your waiting room, put it on any position of your stage, choose up to 2 characters in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
flavor_text: Everyone did it every day. Thinking that, everything became boring.

name: Taking a Break, Mikuru
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or memory, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put this card into your memory. If you do, at the beginning of your next draw phase, choose 1 "Taking a Break, Mikuru" in your memory, and put it on any position of your stage.

name: Reindeer, Mikuru
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from their hand.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Taking a Break, Haruhi
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of your center stage gets +500 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 《Brigade Leader》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: I'm hungry anyway, so let's go eat lunch.

name: Outrageous Behavior, Haruhi
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "A Day in the Clubroom" is in your climax area, choose up to 1 level 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, put it into their waiting room, choose up to 1 《Brigade Leader》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "10th Anniversary" Haruhi
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Brigade Leader》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

【AUTO】 When "Someday in the Rain" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [Put 1 other character from your stage into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 1 or higher 《Brigade Leader》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character, put it on any position of your stage, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn." (Otherwise, return the card to its original place)

name: A Day in the Clubroom
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I'll tell you what the SOS Brigade is set on doing! That is... ...to find aliens, future men, and espers and play with them!

name: Tree-Colored Dress, Nagato
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 level 1 or lower character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Alien》 or 《SOS Brigade》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Taking a Break, Nagato
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Alien》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: It's not impossible, but I would not advise it.

name: Eyecandy in Summer, Haruhi & Mikuru
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 2 "Endless Eight" in your waiting room, and return them to your hand.
【ACT】 [Put 8 "Endless Eight" from your memory into your waiting room] Perform the following action 8 times. "Deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)

name: Producer for Mikuru, Haruhi
expansion: Power Up Set 2023 - The Melancholy of Suzumiya Haruhi
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Brigade Leader》 or 《SOS Brigade》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Haruhi: "Mikuru, let's get a little bit more sexy..."
